comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: P-47D serial 43-25649 probably photographed very late in the war - or postwar - still carries remnants of her service with the 35th FG, as evidenced by the scalloped flash on the engine cowling. Her wing pylons, machine guns and windshield armor glass have been stripped, hinting she may be used now as a unit 'hack' or staff aircraft...
